snippet: Ethnic tensions in East Haven have included the arrests of four police officers accused of mistreating Hispanics, and sarcastic remarks by Mayor Joseph Maturo Jr.
abstract: Decision to hold the 2012 Latino Expo in East Haven, Conn, seems to many an unlikely choice; recent Justice Dept investigation into charges that the city's police department fostered a culture of racial profiling and intimidation, depriving Hispanics and other minority groups of their rights, led to the arrest of four police officers in January.
lead_paragraph: Ethnic tensions in East Haven have included the arrests of four police officers accused of mistreating Hispanics, and sarcastic remarks by Mayor Joseph Maturo Jr.

headline.seo: In Connecticut, East Haven Is Unlikely Site of Latino Expo
headline.main: Unlikely Connecticut Town for Annual Latino Expo
headline.print_headline: Unlikely Connecticut Town for This Year’s Latino Expo
